title: THE great decisive day is at hand

verses.text: THE great decisive day is at hand! The great decisive day is at hand! The day when Christ will come To call his children home, And to seal the sinner's doom, Is at hand, is at hand; And to seal the sinner's doom, is at hand.

Those who made his crown of thorns will be there, will be there; Those who made his crown of thorns will be there. Those who smote him with the reed, Upon his sacred head, And made him temples bleed, Will be there, will be there; And made him temples bleed, will be there.

Where will the sinner hide in that day, in that day? Where will the sinner hide in that day? He will call in vain to call, Upon mountains on us fall, For his hand will find out all In that day, in that day; For his hand will find out all in that day.
